00008 void MultiplicativeWeightChange::ApplyWeightChange(Interconnection * Connection, double SpikeTime){
00009         int indexp;
00010         float activ;
00011         WeightChange *wchani;
00012         
00013         for(indexp=0;indexp<this->GetNumExps();indexp++){
00014                 Connection->SetActivityAt(indexp,1+Connection->GetActivityAt(indexp)*exp((Connection->GetLastSpikeTime()-SpikeTime)*this->GetLparAt(indexp)));
00015         }
00016         
00017         Connection->SetLastSpikeTime(SpikeTime);
00018         Connection->SetWeight(Connection->GetWeight() + this->GetA1Pre()*((this->GetA1Pre() > 0.0)?(Connection->GetMaxWeight()-Connection->GetWeight()):Connection->GetWeight()));
00019         
00020         if(this->GetTrigger() == 1){
00021                 Interconnection *interi;
00022                 for(int i=0; i<Connection->GetTarget()->GetInputNumber(); ++i){
00023                         interi=Connection->GetTarget()->GetInputConnectionAt(i);
00024                         wchani=interi->GetWeightChange();
00025                         if (wchani!=0){
00026                                 activ=0;
00027                                 for(indexp=0;indexp<wchani->GetNumExps();indexp++){
00028                                         activ+=wchani->GetCparAt(indexp)*interi->GetActivityAt(indexp)*exp((interi->GetLastSpikeTime()-SpikeTime)*wchani->GetLparAt(indexp));
00029                                 }
00030                                 interi->SetWeight(interi->GetWeight() + wchani->GetA2PrePre()*activ*((wchani->GetA2PrePre() > 0.0)?(interi->GetMaxWeight()-interi->GetWeight()):interi->GetWeight()));
00031                         }
00032         }
00033         }
00034 }
